import React from 'react'; import './AssetDetails.scss' const AssetDetails = props =>{ const { asset_type: AssetType, attributes: Attributes, due_date: DueDate, state: Status, submitted_date: SubmittedDate} = props.Data && props.Data; let customKey = 0; const attributeElements = Attributes && Attributes.map(each=>{ const { attribute, attribute_value: AttributeValue} = each; customKey += 1; return (
{attribute} {AttributeValue}
) }) return (
Details
Asset Type {AssetType}
Submitted Date: {SubmittedDate}
Due Date {DueDate}
Status {Status}
Attributes
{attributeElements}
History
10:03 Bat & Ball On time
10:03 Bat & Ball On time
10:03 Bat & Ball On time and other text that may span over 2 lines
10:03 Bat & Ball On time
10:03 Bat & Ball On time
10:03 Bat & Ball On time
10:03 Bat & Ball On time
10:03 Bat & Ball On time
10:03 Bat & Ball On time
10:03 Bat & Ball On time
) } export default AssetDetails;
